forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 5pm, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms. Sunny. High near 87, with temperatures falling to around 85 in the afternoon. North northwest wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 8pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 60. North northeast wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
